properties.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 4 at 5:00AM PST until February 5 at 10:00AM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning this morning, sub-freezing
temperatures as low as 20. For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight,
sub- freezing temperatures as low as 21 expected.

* WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys.

* WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning this morning, until 10 AM PST
this morning. For the Hard Freeze Warning tonight, from 6 PM
this evening to 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other
sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor
plumbing.
properties.instruction:
Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent
freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should
be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have
in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above-
ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

NWSheadline: HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
